mathematica: With[{F = Fibonacci}, Reap[For[n = 0, n < 1000, n++, If[F[n - 1] < 2^Floor[Log[2, F[n]]] && F[n + 1] >= 2^(Floor[Log[2, F[n]]] + 1) && F[n + 2] >= 2^(Floor[Log[2, F[n]]] + 2), Sow[n]]]][[2, 1]]] // Differences (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 27 2016 *)
author: Antti Karttunen and _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999.
extensions: Does this sequence only contain 10's and 13's?
